reviewText: Instruction is sound and compassionate for pup. Teaches you what to do when and shows you how to build the right relationship with your pup. Your pup will be eager to progress, at his level of learning, or with a little push from you. I have read or watched literally dozens and dozens of training materials, looking to improve or learn what I don't know, each time we get a new pup.  German Shepherds and Golden Retrievers, all have been hunting/tracking companions and part of the family. Yes you can teach a Shepherd to hunt/retrieve. This DvD relies on the use of choke chain pops.  I do not use a choke chain, but tailor their idea to me and our dog. Top tier training, I would buy it again.
if your considering your own self training, this is a great tool. i've been using this for 2 weeks now and it is working great, Awesome value and help.
